mapper.sql: sys_id, order_no, person_barcode, person_barcode_confirmed, sample_code, draw_completed, draw_complete_time, is_handovered, handover_by, handover_time, images
mapper.update: update exam_handover_sheet set person_barcode_confirmed=#{personBarcodeConfirmed},-- 二维码状态 sample_code=#{sampleCode},-- 血液样本编码 draw_completed=#{drawCompleted}-- 抽血是否完成 WHERE order_no=#{orderNo}
mapper.select: select ehs.sample_code, -- 样本编码 si.name, -- 机构名称 ehs.handover_time, -- 提交时间 ehs.handover_by, -- 提交人 ehs.images FROM exam_handover_sheet as ehs LEFT JOIN order_appointment as oa ON ehs.order_no=oa.order_no LEFT JOIN sys_institution as si ON si.institution_id=oa.institution_id WHERE ehs.order_no=#{orderNo} and ehs.is_handovered=1
